description: This component hides its children from screenreaders, they will read the text specified by the `alt` prop instead @module AccessibleContent AccessibleContent provides a textual alternative to the presentational content it is wrapping. It utilizes the `alt` prop that is very similar in concept to the 'alt' attribute of an HTML tag. The content should be descriptive enough that a screen reader user gets the gist purely through text. Note the caveats on hiding content from screen readers. (see [PresentationContent](#PresentationContent)) ```js --- type: example --- Presentational content goes here ```

alt.description: The text that screenreaders will read. Will not be visible.

as.description: the element type to render the screen reader content as

children.description: Content that will be hidden from screenreaders (via `aria-hidden` set to `true`)

title: AccessibleContent
